$schema.description: The JSON schema reference for validation.

includeOptionsRequests.description: Determines whether to include OPTIONS requests in the generated OpenAPI spec. Default: false.

specFormat.description: Specifies the format of the generated OpenAPI spec. Allowed values: 'Json' or 'Yaml'. Default: 'Json'.

includeResponseHeaders.description: Determines whether to include request headers in the generated OpenAPI spec. Default: false.

name.description: The name of the contact person or organization.

url.description: The URL pointing to the contact information.

email.description: The email address of the contact person or organization.

website.description: The corporate website URL for the API.

privacyPolicy.description: The privacy policy URL for the API.
